title: misc/vim: Add compiler plugin for Go
body:
by **676c7473**: 
misc/vim currently doesn't have a compiler plugin. See ":h :compiler".
https://groups.google.com/d/msg/golang-nuts/XYMw0jKAmt4/xb8NhjgBY9cJ

A compiler plugin provides integration of a language-specific build tool
(go build) with the ":make" command and the quickfix list.

Would you accept a CL for a simple Go compiler plugin in misc/vim?
